game.name: Snowball Christmas World
game.description: Snowball is back in a Christmas special. Our dear cat will have to go through 20 levels, in a new world covered with snow. And on the way, you have to catch all the birds and rats of their world. Find the key and go through the door that leads to a new level! Tap to jump and hold to jump higher.
game.metaTitle: Snowball Christmas World, Platform Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Snowball Christmas World at atmegame.com ! We have selected this platform games for best excitement and thrill in you!
game.metaKeyword: Snowball Christmas World Game, Girls Games,  Game, Online Games, Play Free Games, Flash Games, Browser Game
game.mobileControlKeys: TAP ON THE SCREEN TO JUMP
game.webControlKeys: L-CLICK OF MOUSE/UP ARROW TO JUMP
